title: Replace ANSI escape codes with Bubble Tea program lifecycle
body:
## Description
Remove direct ANSI escape code usage from UIManager and replace with proper Bubble Tea program lifecycle management.

## Current Problem
- Direct use of `fmt.Print("\033[2J\033[H")` for screen clearing
- Manual cursor save/restore with `fmt.Print("\033[s")` and `fmt.Print("\033[u")`
- Platform compatibility issues with escape codes

## Tasks
- [ ] Remove `fmt.Print("\033[2J\033[H")` calls in `displayProgressHeader()`
- [ ] Remove cursor save/restore in `renderHeaderWithFlickerReduction()`
- [ ] Replace with `tea.ClearScreen()` and proper model updates
- [ ] Update `setupScrollRegion()` to use Bubble Tea viewport instead

## Files to Modify
- `ccw/ui/terminal_ui.go` 
- `ccw/ui/ui_components.go`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] No direct ANSI escape codes in UI code
- [ ] Screen clearing handled by Bubble Tea program
- [ ] Cursor management handled by Bubble Tea models
- [ ] Cross-platform compatibility maintained

## Dependencies
None - this is a foundational change that other issues can build upon.
